```{r}
#| echo: false

default_chunk_hook  <- knitr::knit_hooks$get("chunk")

latex_font_size <- c("Huge", "huge", "LARGE", "Large", 
                     "large", "normalsize", "small", 
                     "footnotesize", "scriptsize", "tiny")

knitr::knit_hooks$set(chunk = function(x, options) {
  x <- default_chunk_hook(x, options)
  if(options$size %in% latex_font_size) {
    paste0("\n \\", options$size, "\n\n", 
      x, 
      "\n\n \\normalsize"
    )
  } else {
    x
  }
})

```

```{r}
recipe.Caprese = read_html("website/CapreseSandwiches.html")
recipe.Caprese
ingredients.Caprese = html_element(recipe.Caprese, "#ingredients")
ingredients.Caprese
ingredients = html_elements(ingredients.Caprese, "li")
Caprese.instructions.section = html_element(recipe.Caprese, "#instructions")
Caprese.instructions.section
Caprese.instructions = html_elements(Caprese.instructions.section, "li")
Caprese.instructions
image.element = html_element(recipe.Caprese,".figure-img")
image.url=paste("website/",html_attr(image.element, "src"), sep="")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
# width="50%" shrinks the image for printing
recipe.title <- recipe.Caprese |> html_element("h1") |> html_text()
cat(paste('![', recipe.title, '](', image.url, "){width=50%}", sep="")) 
```
